original_text: “A man or a woman who is a medium or a necromancer shall surely be put to death. They shall be stoned with stones; their blood shall be upon them.”
korean_text: 남자나 여자가 접신하거나 박수무당이 되거든 반드시 죽일지니 곧 돌로 그를 치라 그들의 피가 자기들에게로 돌아가리라

sentences.original_text: who is a medium or a necromancer
shall surely be put to death.
They shall be stoned with stones
their blood shall be upon them.
